Package com.example.wellfed.common

Class UTCDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • com.example.wellfed.common.UTCDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<java.util.Date>
    public class UTCDate
extends java.util.Date
    The UTCDate class provides extends the Date class with methods for managing dates in UTC time.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a UTCDate object with the specified date
